40005000.English_Text:
(I should ask the ranch owner
what's going on.)

40005001.English_Text:
(There's more to do than I thought.
I'd better move quickly.)
40005001.Chinese_Text:
（工作比预想得更多。
赶快行动吧。）

40005002.English_Text:
(I've got some hay left.
I'd better take it to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>storage</>.)
40005002.Chinese_Text:
（为了查看甘草
走向仓库。）

40005003.English_Text:
(I think I've got enough
Gnarlox leaves.)

40005004.English_Text:
(It looks like the hay is
all set in place.)

40005008.English_Text:
(I'm suspicious of these people.
I should continue to follow the trail of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dead Sheep</>.)
40005008.Chinese_Text:
（对他们的身份
感到疑惑。）

40005010.English_Text:
(These must be the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>ones</>
who butchered the ranch animals.)
40005010.Chinese_Text:
（他们好像就是杀害
牧场动物的犯人。）

40005012.English_Text:
(I should go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Meil</>
and explain what happened.)
40005012.Chinese_Text:
（去跟金梅日说
事情的始末吧。）

40005013.English_Text:
(Ah, what's this?
I found a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>money pouch</>with 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Makara</>'s seal on it.)
40005013.Chinese_Text:
（在洞内发现了印有林延秀印章
的钱袋...）

40005014.English_Text:
(Oh no, does this mean <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Makara</>
also colluded with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Poacher Gang</>?)
40005014.Chinese_Text:
（看来林延秀
还勾结了偷猎团。）

40005015.English_Text:
(I should go to
the abandoned <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Carpenter's Quarters</>
that Hayon mentioned.)
40005015.Chinese_Text:
（去沈河渊说过的
被遗弃的空房吧。）

40005017.English_Text:
(Could she be the one
who was bought off by the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>?
I'd better go ask.)
40005017.Chinese_Text:
（他就是四虎收买的人？
去问问是不是他。）

40005018.English_Text: All right, let's see what you've got.

40005019.English_Text:
All right, enough!
That's good enough.
40005019.Chinese_Text:
住，住手！
这样就够了。

40005020.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>monsters</> are north
of our encampment.
40005020.Chinese_Text:
那个怪物就在
我们基地上面。

40005021.Chinese_Text:
（呜呜…有个肮脏又巨大的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>污物堆</>。）

40005022.English_Text:
(I have no choice 
but to investigate.)
40005022.Chinese_Text:
（没办法...
只能调查那个东西...）

40005023.Chinese_Text:
（这里面
好像有那个怪物。）

40005024.English_Text:
(I'd better take care of
the gigantic frog monster
quickly.)
40005024.Chinese_Text:
（快点消灭
巨型青蛙怪物吧。）

40005025.Chinese_Text:
（唔…怪物的样子
跟普通水蛙族不同。）

40005026.English_Text:
(I'll go to the Blue <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Bandits Boss's tent</>
and present him the monster's head.)
40005026.Chinese_Text:
（去苍盗团头目的帐篷
上交怪物的头颅吧。）

40005027.Chinese_Text:
（请求与石拳独处，
却被恼怒的石拳斥责过于放肆。）

40005028.Chinese_Text:
（再次回到致渊那里
问有没有办法吧。）

40005029.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>돌주먹</>의 환심을 사려면\n선물을 바쳐야 할 것 같다)
40005029.English_Text:
(I need a bribe
to win favor with Stonefist.)
40005029.Chinese_Text:
（若想获得石拳的欢心，
需要献上礼物。）

40005030.English_Text:
(Let's do as Chiyun said
and find the Sword of Truth
near the Poacher Gang Base.)
40005030.Chinese_Text:
（根据致渊所说的话，
去基地寻找真实之剑吧。）

40005032.English_Text:
(I've found an expensive-looking <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword</>
inside the chest.)
40005032.Chinese_Text:
（在箱子里发现了
看起来很贵的剑。）

40005033.English_Text:
(This must be
the Sword of Truth.
Let's bring it back.)
40005033.Chinese_Text:
（看来这就是真实之剑。
带回去吧。）

40005034.English_Text:
(Mm... I think he spilled it
because he was scared.)
40005034.Chinese_Text:
（嗯...感觉是因为害怕
而全盘吐露的吧...？）

40005035.Original_Text: (아무튼 기회가 온 것 같으니\n두목의 천막을 조사하자)
40005035.English_Text:
(Anyway, I'd better seize this opportunity
and check out the boss's tent.)
40005035.Chinese_Text:
（总之这是个好机会，
调查头目的帐篷吧。）

40005036.English_Text:
(Oh, I've been found! I should
eliminate them and escape.)
40005036.Chinese_Text: （最好在有人看到之前快点离开。）

40005037.Original_Text: (딱히 눈에 띄는 것은\n발견하지 못한 것 같다)
40005037.English_Text:
(I didn't find
anything out of the ordinary.)

40005038.English_Text:
(I collected the evidence.
I should bring it to Hayon.)
40005038.Chinese_Text:
（…附上多余的物资与
巡逻执勤表…）

40005039.Original_Text: 너, 너 지금 뭐 하는 거냐!!\n침입자다! 침입자다!!
40005039.English_Text:
Wh-what are you doing?
Intruder alert! Intruder!
40005039.Chinese_Text:
（...希望造成适当的危害。
-林延秀）

40005040.English_Text:
(I want some real damage done...
- Owner <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Makara</>)
40005040.Chinese_Text:
你，你在干什么！！
入侵者！有入侵者！！

40005041.English_Text: (Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Tile House</> where we're supposed to meet <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chiyun</>.)
40005041.Chinese_Text:
（目击者应该都被干掉了。
回到致渊那里吧。）

40005043.English_Text:
(I should go back to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Tile House</>
where I met Chiyun for the first time.)
40005043.Chinese_Text:
（去第一次与致渊见面的
被遗弃的空房吧。）

40005044.English_Text:
(It seems their speech
is about to begin.)
40005044.Chinese_Text:
（苍盗团应该在一段时间内
无法嚣张起来了。）

40005045.English_Text:
(I should look around the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Deep Forest Graveyard</>
and the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shade Swamp</> vicinity.)
40005045.Chinese_Text:
（查看幽深墓地森林附近
与阴影沼泽吧。）

40005047.Original_Text: (충분히 살펴본 것 같다.\n이제 숲 쪽으로 가보자)
40005047.English_Text:
(There's nothing to see here anymore.
I'll go to the Forest.)
40005047.Chinese_Text:
（已经充分查看过了。
去森林那边吧。）

40005048.English_Text:
(Someone must have dragged
the children into the Forest.)
40005048.Chinese_Text:
（孩子们好像被某个人
抓到了森林。）

40005049.Chinese_Text:
（看来有必要
进入森林里确认一下。）

40005050.English_Text:
(The place is clear of monsters now.
I'll look for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</>.)
40005050.Chinese_Text:
（整理好周围了...
去找鬼火吧。）

40005051.English_Text:
(The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</> disappeared right before my eyes.
I'd better take care of the monsters around me and look for it.)
40005051.Chinese_Text:
（鬼火在眼前消失了。）
（整理好周围后再寻找吧！）

40005052.English_Text:
(The place is clear of monsters now.
I'll look for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</>.)
40005052.Chinese_Text:
（整理好周围了...
去找鬼火吧。）

40005053.English_Text:
(That <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</> seems
to be showing me
the children's location.)
40005053.Chinese_Text:
（那个鬼火
好像在告诉我孩子们的位置。）

40005055.English_Text:
(The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</> disappeared right before my eyes.
I'd better take care of monsters around me
and then look for it.)
40005055.Chinese_Text:
（鬼火在眼前消失了。）
（整理好周围后再寻找吧！）

40005056.English_Text:
(The place is clear of monsters now.
I'll look for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</>.)
40005056.Chinese_Text:
（整理好周围了...
去找鬼火吧。）

40005057.English_Text:
(The place is clear of monsters now.
I'll look for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</>.)
40005057.Chinese_Text:
（整理好周围了...
去找鬼火吧。）

40005058.English_Text:
(The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</> disappeared right before my eyes.
Let's go a bit further.)
40005058.Chinese_Text:
（鬼火在眼前消失了。）
（继续往前走吧。）

40005059.English_Text:
(The Child Spirit is over there.
I'd better follow it before it disappears.)

40005061.English_Text:
(I think I heard it from here...
I'm not hearing things, am I?)
40005061.Chinese_Text: （到处都有鼠人族与鳄鱼挡路。）

40005062.English_Text:
Is no one there? Oh, no...
I'm going to die, plog!

40005063.Chinese_Text:
（一边消灭被侵蚀的野兽，
一边去水蛙族据点吧。）

40005066.Chinese_Text:
（那个巴隆好像是
之前见过的东东。）

40005067.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>,
may I have a moment of your time?

40005068.English_Text:
(I have to catch <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Makara</>
before he runs away.)
40005068.Chinese_Text:
（在林延秀逃走之前
抓住他。）

40005069.English_Text:
(That must be Dondon,
the Baron I bumped into previously.)
40005069.Chinese_Text:
呃啊！不要！！
大山！！连你也！！！！

40005071.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Makara</>'s spells
that have been lingering
over Sapphire Basin have been lifted!)
40005071.Chinese_Text:
（笼罩在半月湖的
林延秀的阴影终于全部消散了！）

40005072.Original_Text: (이제 더는 지체할 수 없을 것 \n같다. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월 대륙</>으로 가는 \n배를 타볼까?)
40005072.English_Text:
(We can't wait
any longer. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shall we board
the ship bound for Haewol</>?)
40005072.Chinese_Text:
（不能再耽搁了。
去乘坐前往海越大陆的船吧？）

40005073.Chinese_Text:
（去新大鱼坊总舵
看看吧！）

40005079.Chinese_Text:
（啊啊...感觉好晕。
而且好像来错地方了。）

40005080.English_Text:
The chief should be at the house
up there, plog!
40005080.Chinese_Text:
村长大人在上面的
那个房子里呱！

40005081.English_Text:
(This is Gasa's home,
but no one's here.)
40005081.Chinese_Text:
（这里应该是郭汜的家，但没有人。
好像出去找孩子了。）

40005082.English_Text:
(They must have gone out
to look for the kids.)

40005083.English_Text:
(I should clear out the Poacher Gang
who are hindering my search<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>and find
the Sword of Truth</>.)
40005083.Chinese_Text:
（一边打倒跑来阻碍的偷猎团成员，
一边寻找<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>真实之剑</>吧。）

40005084.English_Text:
(Where did the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Child Spirit</> that was just here
a moment ago disappear to?)

40005085.Chinese_Text:
（看不清楚周围。
一边清理周围，一边寻找吧。）

40005090.English_Text:
(Let's use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>signal flare</>
Chiyun gave me.)
40005090.Chinese_Text: （在这里使用致渊给的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>信号弹</>吧。）

40005093.Original_Text: (이제 낙오된 수와족은\n더 이상 없는 것 같다)
40005093.English_Text:
(It seems there's
no more straggling Ploggles.)
40005093.Chinese_Text:
（已经没有
落伍的水蛙族了。）

40005094.English_Text:
(I think I've got enough
Bulbari leaves.)

40005095.English_Text:
This is fake!
Where is that rascal?!
40005095.Chinese_Text:
这是假的！
那家伙在哪里！！！

40005096.English_Text:
Hey, wait!
I want to talk to you!
40005096.Chinese_Text:
喂！请等一下！
我有话要说！

40005097.English_Text:
I could have stayed here all day.
Thank you, plog!
40005097.Chinese_Text:
（差点折腾了一整天蛙。
谢谢你蛙！！）

40005098.Chinese_Text:
（你让我去那边蛙？
谢谢你蛙！！）

40005099.English_Text:
(Now that I've got good hay,
I'd better bring it to the ranch.)
40005099.Chinese_Text:
（准备好了优质干草。
放到牧场的各个角落吧。）

40005100.English_Text: What did you do with the child?

40005101.English_Text: Hmpf, that's none of your business!

40005103.English_Text:
(Let's hunt the saberfangs
and obtain the leather.)

40005104.English_Text:
(This should be enough, right?
Let's go back to Stonefist.)
40005104.Chinese_Text:
（这么多应该够用吧？
回到石拳那里吧！）

40005105.English_Text:
(I found a sword in the chest.
It seems to be the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword of Truth</>.)
40005105.Chinese_Text:
(我在盒子里发现了一把剑.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我认为是真理之剑</>)

40005106.English_Text:
(Before I go back,
I should get the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Saberfang Leather</> Chiyun asked of me.)
40005106.Chinese_Text:
(回来之前先说一下
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>池妍要的虎皮</>)

40005107.English_Text:
(The Child Spirit disappeared again.
After taking a look around...)
40005107.Chinese_Text:
(东子令又消失了.
环顾四周……)

40005108.English_Text:
(There's another child!
I should go to them quickly.)
40005108.Chinese_Text:
(我又看到一个孩子了!
快点说吧)

40005109.English_Text:
Is anyone there?
Please save me, plog!
40005109.Chinese_Text:
没有人在那里!! 
 苏,救苏!!!

40005110.Original_Text: (음? 무슨 소릴 들은 것 같은데\n어느 쪽이지? 저쪽인가?)
40005110.English_Text:
(Hm? I think I heard something.
Where is it coming from? There?)
40005110.Chinese_Text:
(嗯?我好像听到了什么
哪一边?那一边?)
